titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to retroactively restore and make permanent the exclusion for amounts received under group legal services plans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/18/1995--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent and retroactive the exclusion from gross income of amounts received under qualified group legal services plans.
